itemDisplayName: DMZ Example 3 – Build a DMZ to Protect Networks with a Firewall, UDR, and NSG
description: This example will create a simple DMZ with four windows servers, a firewall, a VNet with three subnets, User Defined Routing, and a Network Security Group.
summary: Build a DMZ with a Firewall, User Defined Routing (UDR), and Network Security Groups (NSG)
